Home buyers seem to make the same set of four major mistakes. It doesn't matter if they're buying their first, second, or ninth home; these are issues I see all kinds of buyers make. Today, I wanted to share them with you in hopes of helping you avoid them when the time comes to buy your next home. One of the most costly of these four mistakes is getting pre-approved with an online or out-of-state vendor. These vendors may offer a slightly cheaper rate, but they don't have a local contact for you to meet with, and they're prone to bad experiences in customer service. To learn all four mistakes and how to avoid them, watch this short video.

4 Major Home Buying Mistakes to Avoid

Home buyers seem to make the same set of four major mistakes. It doesn't matter if they're buying their first, second, or ninth home; these are issues I see all kinds of buyers make. Today, I wanted to share them with you in hopes of helping you avoid them when the time comes to buy your next home. One of the most costly of these four mistakes is getting pre-approved with an online or out-of-state vendor. These vendors may offer a slightly cheaper rate, but they don't have a local contact for you to meet with, and they're prone to bad experiences in customer service. To learn all four mistakes and how to avoid them, watch this short video.
